Header.title: Every Player, everywhere
Header.paragraph: A global community-based protocol that provides proof of athletics for youth athletes.

About.paragraph: Aletico is a global NFT commons where athletes can come together and share their skills with the world.

Features.title: Athletes
Features.text: Athletes create cards to track their athletic data such as games, awards, and statistics.

Features.title: Coaches
Features.text: Coaches can create new cards or add existing cards their team. They can then hand out proof-of-play and award NFTs.

Features.title: Parents
Features.text: Parents can help track younger children's sports history and hand it off to their kid when they hit the big time.

Features.title: Fan(atics)
Features.text: Fans can follow athletes and help track and validate individual and team statistics.
